content:
# rsp-fe

Frontend part of Rock, Scissors, Paper game.

[![travis ci](https://travis-ci.org/s-kalaus/rsp-fe.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/s-kalaus/rsp-fe)

[Coverage Report](https://s-kalaus.github.io/rsp-fe/coverage/index.html)

[Documentation](https://s-kalaus.github.io/rsp-fe/documentation/index.html)

[Demo](https://s-kalaus.github.io/rsp-fe/dist/index.html)

## Development
* `npm run build` - build production version (to `/dist`)
* `npm start` - run in development mode (watcher)
* `npm run lint` - run linter
* `npm test` - run mocha unit tests
* `npm run coverage` - run mocha unit tests & generate coverage report to `/coverage` folder
* `npm run doc` - generate documentation to `/documentation` folder
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "rsp-fe",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "FE part of Rock Scissors Paper game",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "./node_modules/.bin/karma start --single-run",
    "coverage": "./node_modules/.bin/karma start --code-coverage --single-run --reporters coverage-istanbul",
    "build": "./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "start": "./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack.config.dev.js --watch",
    "doc": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "lint": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint --quiet --config .eslintrc.json src/scripts/* src/scripts/class/* --ignore-pattern *.spec.js"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+ssh://git@github.com/s-kalaus/rsp-fe.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "game",
    "rock",
    "scossors",
    "paper"
  ],
  "author": {
    "name": "Sergey Kalaus",
    "email": "sergey@kalaus.ru",
    "url": "http://kalaus.ru"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/s-kalaus/rsp-fe/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/s-kalaus/rsp-fe#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.0.0",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.2",
    "bluebird": "^3.5.2",
    "copy-webpack-plugin": "^4.5.2",
    "css-loader": "^1.0.0",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "^3.2.0",
    "istanbul-instrumenter-loader": "^3.0.1",
    "jasmine-core": "^3.2.1",
    "karma": "^3.0.0",
    "karma-coverage": "^1.1.2",
    "karma-coverage-istanbul-reporter": "^2.0.4",
    "karma-jasmine": "^1.1.2",
    "karma-phantomjs-launcher": "^1.0.4",
    "karma-sourcemap-loader": "^0.3.7",
    "karma-spec-reporter": "^0.0.32",
    "karma-webpack": "^3.0.4",
    "node-sass": "^4.9.3",
    "phantomjs-polyfill-object-assign": "0.0.2",
    "sass-loader": "^7.1.0",
    "style-loader": "^0.23.0",
    "webpack": "^4.17.2",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.1.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.5.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
